comments.body: I think this would be a very cute idea.I personally like the lush caves a lot therefore the only mob that it has is usually zombies, axolotls, and glow squid.I think adding another mob in the lush caves would be a great idea.My 100% vote goes to this poll.
That sounds cool!
It Isn’t a bad idea, but I think diamond armour is to op, many chainmail would be more balanced.

How about when they die, they drop an object that can be made into a beacon of some sorts that stops them from stalking you and turns them neutral, until it is destroyed? That way some players that are easily scared won't have to worry about them.
I like the idea, but would fishermen be able to use the barrel in the boat?
brilliant idea makes complete sense
Nice idea!
And maybe even enable us to put custom blocks on boats with new nbt i guess

I think this is a great idea, not only would it make sense by the logic you described, but it would also look nice and add a nice aesthetic to the boats. But I think that a better idea would possibly be that both boats with barrels AND boats with chest should exist, just so that it could possibly add some variety.
Boats don't have chests either!
I LLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This should still be considered. Give barrels another use instead of chests (which already has several other crafts); chests have use in 4 crafting recipes, plus the boat with chest item, barrels have 0. They need more attention. Also, because it simply makes more sense to use a barrel in a boat.
That would be awesome!
i just want individual dogs like axolotls and pandas and cats

I would love to see this in minecraft, I would also love if these different breed of wolves has they're unique "perks" like if we have the Arctic Wolves: it's really fast has high, low on damage and can only be found on snowy biomes, let's also have the Grey Wolves: Strong, high on knockback, medium speed and it's more rare. I would love to see different tiers of wolves on minecraft.
yes I agree
this would be interesting and cool if minecraft added more wolf types

Clarified subject to help search results.

Thanks for your contribution.

I'd like my dogs to be much tougher as well...not mean and nasty but harder to kill.  My computer has microphones and voice capable...how about voice control over the dog??  

What do you think?

Why not just have parrotfish 'poop' out white sand in the water and drift to nearby lands to start building the new beaches? Of course it would probably be a slow process but I think that makes more sense for the game.

I can see people farming parrotfish to get lots of white sand lol. Like your idea, hope Mojang considers it whenever they decide to add more creatures to the ocean again!
Well, it doesn't ALLways absorb you. It' 25% chance.

This would have more potential I'm thinking down in the caves.

Ye' just ain't been mining till a Slime blocks the other mouth of the cave, with all the intent to gobble you up. But don't you go down without a swinging fight.
GLOOOOOOMP. <dragongirl4378 was absorbed then eaten by slime>
Ooh! Like gelatinous cube! D&D fans where u at!
Snakes are my favorite animal. :)
Ok?

I would put in way more variations! the different type should have different strengths! like constrictors should be able to take on big strong mobs easily but they should be more rare (but not too rare) snakes should live anywhere! (plains are one exception unless a tall grass plain biome is added) there should be some swimming snakes (Rare) and stuff like that I have to go to bed for now but i will come back for more! (: <
Sen türk müsün
I Think Free Roam Would Be Great, Pets also sleeping at night would be cool.
What about Bedrock? Possibly tapping them in sneak? Also, i think they should only roam a 5×5 block area.

They should take damage when exposed to high light levels, to ensure that they stay either deep down in the ocean, or in water-filled caves.  Also, if they are exposed to any level of light, they should attempt to swim downwards.  (Also, they should drop glowstone)
Yes, one glowstone and one raw angler. The angler could be eaten to give 6 (raw) or 10 (cooked) hunger points / food points to the player.
They should only become hostile if the player gets too close to them.
Love this idea, but for me the should generate Deep in the water caves.
With the new caves and cliffs update, oceans might get deeper so at the bottom or in caves this would fit perfectly.

Maybe the angler fish could drop its head as an item when defeated. This item would be equipped in the helmet slot and would act as dynamic lighting. Not only could you explore a cave without needing torches, but you could also see underwater easier since you don't have to place light sources in order to see. The angler fish head could probably have as much protection as a leather helmet considering both items are made of skin and would need to be recharged with glowstone to keep the item`s durability up.
Interesting
Glow squid ink sacs should also be able to give leather armor a glowing effect
I love your idea!!!
Thank you glow squids are BAD!!!!!!!!!
That might be beautiful :D
Glowing Potion + Fermented Spider Eye = Blindness Potion and more Profit
Why wouldn't this be added to the game it sounds like an amazing idea and gives the glow squid a use!
Then glowing armor
I guess you mean this gives you the glowing effect when you drink it? You should add more detail
I think that if you brew a potion using a glow ink sac, it should make a potion of glowing. Fun for servers.
And spectral arrows

Potion made from glow ink sac. Short-term effect gained from eating glow berries. When given to player, player emits light to aid with mining or swimming but does not effect mob spawns (including for dungeon spawners). When thrown on ground (as a splash potion), the light acts the same as any other light source, and may give the effect to the player.

Since the Warden lives deep underground, it makes sense for it to be very sensitive to light. A player having the glowing effect will only alert the Warden to their presence. However, throwing a glow potion at the Warden will cause it to go blind for a small amount of time, allowing the player a few seconds to go back into hiding in an emergency.
Splash potion would making quickly temporarily lighting up a big cave a breeze
Madagascar day gecko, gargoyle gecko and leopard gecko would be good geckos to add

It's official we need Geckos.

Also it would be cool if you could harvest Gecko tails and craft it into a new armor piece which grants the player an increase regeneration rate, adding more similar armor like turtles did. but make it have the same durability as gold.
I agree, Geckos should be in minecraft. Especially all the types you named.

I agree but the lepord gecko should be in the badlands or dark oak forest due to those environments being closer to their real life equivalents in Pakistan they could also make geckos tamable due to their high popularity as pets in real life and you could tame them via meal worms or crickets
I would love this idea to be added to the game because I have my own Gecko!!!
The crested gecko for the forest, the day gecko for the jungle, the leopard gecko for the desert and the tokay gecko for the mangrove swamp.
it would be awesome if you could add an option in the votes to add all 3 mobs cause they all seem to be pretty good and useful mobs this year and i would hate to lose them all

This would make it so that these votes annot be enitrely rigged lie last year's by making all of the mobs exist later. Also, I want the allay because it could be useful for mining and such, but the copper golems sound good for redstone mechanics and the copper buttons sound like a cool building decoration. The glare could probably also have an amazing use as well. It would suck if two were left out forever like those from last year.

I think that the devs wanted to make an alternative to the F3 button with the Glare's mechanics, and I like that. Debug menus felt like cheats. The Glare will help players make low-lit moody bases, checking light level 1 vs 0.

Having said that, I think the Glare needs another use, or else F3 Java players will not care about it. Give it new unique drops! That has never happened to any mob for an extremely long time.
Not only the 2021 vote, from all the previous votes too!
The thing that gets me agitated the most is that there would be no harm in adding all of the mobs from the vote, if anything it would make the game better, and the communities would all be happy.

For the old mob votes, I really wanted mob A, the ocean kraken-like monster, to make Axolotls and Tridents useful. Ocean depths need more content, there's usually only Drowned enemies, and it's boring to fight them again and again. Deep ocean caves are currently empty with no threats. Bane of Arthropods enchant need more uses, so a crab monster will be great, too.

Mojang has stated that losing mobs won't be added to the game. Additionally, with the new 1.18 mob spawning mechanics and because we can tell apart light from darkness, so if it feels dark, just place a torch!
Honestly if all three of them got added I would cry in happiness
You might even be able to breed it using apples? I love this idea! I think it’d be great to add a nocturnal animal!
Please please please!
What if certain ones could carry rabies and spread it?
It would be cool, and giving it good it could have a sitting animation almost like pandas have. It would be cool to see it in a forest taiga or new biome, too.

raccoon

he could steal items from the chest and also the player could give food. and also being the player lets be an items drops to the ground the raccoon was going to pick up the items

Personally I think brown bears would be better in the forest biome and maybe black bears could be found in the taiga biome (though this means all bears should probably come under the same spawn egg as we would have a lot of them in the game if both of these were added)
Also it could eat honey from beehives?
This would be a realy great idea !
Yes this is exactly what we need in minecraft! This would work great for builders and people like me who pretend to be good at minecraft. All in all, this is an amazing idea
Great idea!!
... you know seriously really cool if the mojang adds up these bright dyes would be really cool!! I already had this idea because it would be amazing if my wolf had a shiny collar...
Put the image too
It should be attracted to Glowstone and Shroomlight, and leave a trail of fire particles, like the creator of this mob suggested
i love this idea
i love this idea
They look really cute and I think it would make a great addition to Minecraft, even if they are only atmospheric 😃
They could be like the bee's counterpart in the nether, great idea

If they ever add blue netherwart it could be edible
And the fleamoths could help them grow quicker
this would be so cool
they could help grow nether trees
also glowstone fgarm
Si es muy buena idea
Yes! I hope we can do this. How come you have to kill some mobs in order to get the saddle?
Everyone upvoting this will probably want it for striders as well: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360059975311-Remove-saddles-from-Strider

Agreed! We should be able to remove the saddles from Pigs.
When I have killed them trying to get it back it doesn't always drop the saddle and since saddles are not craftable and not easy to find in Survival, there should be a way to safely remove the saddle from a pig.
Yeah! You should be able remove it by using an empty hand on the pig, like you do with an armor stand. Same should apply for striders.
The Dodo should be tamable with seeds. Also, they shouldn't be afraid of the player, because the whole reason the dodo went extinct was because it wasn't afraid of early settlers.
Thank you for bringing this to my attention. I also think it is a great idea of them being able to be tamed with seeds
I have edited your idea to the post
i think to this animal into the game, will be agree more life for the extinct animals, but the dodo bird can be spawned in a new dimension with dinosaurs.

395421988152
Why? The Dodo is quite a recently extinct animal.
it should not be tamable
People vote this we need the dodo
It would make sense if it only spawned on unpopulated islands with pretty much no other animals to be accurate to how it was to real life before humans arrived
I think dodos should spawn in the beach because that was their natural habitat.

I also think, as a feature that dodos will check for incoming projectiles like arrows and fly or jump over them to dodge the attack. (Was inspired by the game Plants vs. Zombies 2™ with Dodo Rider Zombie. They also need some time before flying again) .They should also be ridden by baby zombies the same way as chickens. Which will make them hostile. Furthermore, since they don't fly, they should take fall damage unlike chickens. Finally, since you mentioned them being bigger, they should also have more health than chickens!Thank You! , Foil Gaming2  ;)
I love the idea of the Dodo Bird!

- Creepers already do that, I think.

- Endermen take damage from water, so that idea makes no sense.

- Your underwater skeleton idea is neat but not needed because we already have Drowned with Tridents.
Also, since the acquatic update, skeletons can dive.
Skeletons will have helmets Luke the drowned and will have kelp/other green plants around them.

The ‘drowned skelleton’ will be covered in kelp, similar to the drowned. It will not have a bow and arrow but an unlimited supply of tridents. Only sometimes you will collect tridents. You will tend  To collect less bones from drowned skeletons than normal ones.
I think it should be mossy

The underwater skeleton should have a unique enchantment on its bow that allows it to shoot its projectiles more easily underwater - making it more rewarding to make a farm for them. Otherwise those arrows would look rather disappointing.

Okay, what about a skeleton fisherman? They sink down, their bow is made of the same pieces used to make a fishing rod. They don't need to be dangerous, the oceans have plenty of that. Instead, they could attempt to pull our boats - and us - down into the water! They could spawn with chest boats sometimes!
Cool idea.
Challenging. Great idea. Would be great if you added some concepts from Egyptian Mythology
It should also have a curse.
I had the same idea so I voted I hope they add it (:
Amazing idea and I love wolves
I have this idea as well I have put some more details and features into it as well so I would recommend checking mine out as well I also included some concept art of my own

When a normal wolf goes into the end it could turn into an ender wolf and have a chance of dropping a collar then if you feed it chorus fruit you can then tame it with a collar. it of course has teleportation abilities and when you tame it it could change from the purple texture to a yellow texture
I just say: thumbs up for this idea!
Yes
i'd love to be able to have an aquarium with glow squids that lights up my base... :O
Make glowsquid pulse once with higher light level when a player is close by.  Allow a light sensor to detect the pulse and activate a redstone circuit.
what about GLOW INK?
It would be great if the Glowsquid either creates light by itself or adds a new light source to the game
How to
YESSSSSSSSS  they should REALLY add the glow squid as a light source.  :D

Love it!
Kelp always goes to the top, and it's so boring. Maybe fish could nibble at all heights, making everything above break. This would vary it even more. People could get really creative with fish powered kelp farms.

Minecraft update makes kelps grow slower..
But add damaged kelp from fishes which ingrown is intresting !
maybe you can breed fish with kelp
This, this would definitely solve that growth problem
